issue.title: Is the new simulator working for anyone?

content.raw:
I can confirm, that if I want to follow “Catkin workspace install” I end up with

_You might want to run 'apt --fix-broken install' to correct these.  
The following packages have unmet dependencies:  
ignition-blueprint : Depends: ignition-gazebo2  
E: Unmet dependencies. Try 'apt --fix-broken install' with no packages \(or specify a solution\)._
content.html:
I can confirm, that if I want to follow “Catkin workspace install” I end up with

You might want to run 'apt --fix-broken install' to correct these.
The following packages have unmet dependencies:
ignition-blueprint : Depends: ignition-gazebo2
E: Unmet dependencies. Try 'apt --fix-broken install' with no packages (or specify a solution).
